tasks.label: Build
tasks.detail: Runs tsc build on all files to find compilation errors.

tasks.label: Build and Watch
tasks.detail: Runs tsc build on all files to find compilation errors every time you change a file. Use this when resolving a bunch of issues.

tasks.label: Lint
tasks.detail: Lints all ts, tsx, js, and jsx files.

tasks.label: Lint and Watch
tasks.detail: Lints all ts, tsx, js, and jsx files every second. Use this when resolving a bunch of issues.

tasks.label: Test
tasks.detail: Runs all tests in the project.  Use the jest runner when you want to watch.

tasks.label: Start App for Web
tasks.detail: Starts the app using yarn start:app:web command.

tasks.label: Open Cypress
tasks.detail: Opens cypress using yarn start:cypress:app command.

tasks.label: Start E2E dev for app
tasks.detail: Runs both start-app and start-cypress tasks in parallel.
